hadiths.text: It was narrated from 'Abdullah bin Ja'far that the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) said:“Allah will be the borrower until he pays off his debt, so long as it (the loan) is not for something that Allah dislikes.”

chapter.ara-name: باب مَنِ ادَّانَ دَيْنًا وَهُوَ يَنْوِي قَضَاءَهُ
chapter.eng-name: One Who Takes A Loan With The Intention Of Repaying It
